title: Coinbase Secures Approval From The Bermuda Monetary Authority
description: The approval allows Coinbase to enable perpetual futures for eligible non-US retail customers, allowing them to participate in perpetual futures trading.

title: Non-Regulation of Web3 Space Making ‘Mainstream Adoption Harder’ Says AGG’s Jack Vinijtrongjit
description: According to Jack Vinijtrongjit, the co-founder and CEO of the Web3 infrastructure company AAG, more prospective users will be drawn to decentralized finance (defi) and non-fungible tokens (NFTs) if tools that help them avoid falling prey to scammers are developed and deployed. Vinijtrongjit argued that the need for such tools will even become “more crucial” […]

title: NSA Announces AI Security Center to Safeguard National Interests
description: In a significant development, the United States National Security Agency (NSA) has unveiled plans to establish an AI security center. This initiative, led by General Paul Nakasone, Director of the NSA and US Cyber Command, oversees the integration and advancement of artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities within US defense and intelligence services. General Nakasone’s announcement reflects ... Read more

title: NATO Advancing Real-time Detection Technologies for Underwater Infrastructure Security
description: In collaboration with 14 member nations and Sweden, NATO is intensifying efforts to enhance security around underwater critical infrastructure. The move comes in response to the incidents involving the Nord Stream pipeline last year, underscoring the inherent challenges in monitoring such vital assets.  In an ongoing 12-day exercise off the coast of Portugal, a consortium ... Read more

title: Total Surveillance or Blessing for the World? Buenos Aires to Issue Ethereum-Based Digital ID That Includes Birth, Marriage Certificates, Proof of Income, and Academic Verification
description: The capital of Argentina has announced it will issue a blockchain-based digital ID to be issued on the Ethereum blockchain. With records of citizens’ birth, marriage certificates, proof of income, and academic verification, some are questioning the reach of surveillance by the government. The Capital of Argentina Buenos Aires has announced that it will issue [...]

title: Ethereum Co-Founder Exits Maker ($MKR), Buys Ethereum ($ETH) As $ROE’s Demand Explodes
description: After two years of inactivity, Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin sold his remaining stake in MakerDAO (MKR) for 353 ETH, worth approximately $580K. On the other hand, the demand for Borroe.Finance ($ROE) is skyrocketing thanks to the network’s inventiveness of making Web3 fundraising easier and seamless. >>BUY $ROE TOKENS NOW<< Borroe.Finance has Already Bagged 50% Returns [...]

title: Quantstamp Made a Strategic Partnership With Toku
description:
Toku and Quantstamp, two major web3 firms, are pleased to announce a strategic agreement. This alliance will combine security audits and compensation tax audits as part of a bundled service to give blockchain enterprises seamless support to run their businesses. The Quantstamp & Toku Partnership will Bring More Security to the Ecosystem As the web3 […]

title: PEPE Could Look To Target $0.0000009809 After Huge Whale Purchase
description:
Earlier today, Lookonchain shared that a whale spent 390 ETH to buy PEPE tokens. This likely contributed to PEPE’s more than 9% price surge over the past day of trading.
